sentence: Stepan Company ( SCL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on May 28, 2014.
A cash dividend payment of $0.17 per share is scheduled to be paid on June 13, 2014.
Shareholders who purchased SCL stock prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 3rd quarter that SCL has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $52.01, the dividend yield is 1.31%.
The previous trading day's last sale of SCL was $52.01, representing a -22.6% decrease from the 52 week high of $67.20 and a 1.68% increase over the 52 week low of $51.15.
SCL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
SCL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $2.91.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the SCL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
